---
title: Revoke Token
api: POST /auth/token/revoke
description: "This endpoint is used to invalidate your current active bearer token"
---

<Info>

</Info>

<ResponseExample>

```json
{
	"data": {
		"accessToken": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..g475CjbgAOUr1E8O_RgM0yNl76P_4kiIAoFiTpEX-AA",
		"tokenType": "Bearer",
		"expiresAt": "3600"
	},
	"message": "Completed successfully",
	"status": "success",
	"statusCode": 200,
	"errors": []
}
```

</ResponseExample>
